_header: To them that before this image of pity
_description: An indulgence of 32,765 years of pardon for reciting five Pater nosters and Aves — four irregular lines on a woodcut

BodArchGe35.Transcription:
To þem þat before þis ymage off pyteDeuoutly . v .
                    tymes say pater noster & auePite[ously] beholding þies ar[ ]*
                    [crist]es passionAre [ ]ii . M . vii . c . [ ] off pardon
BodArchGe35.Note:
The fragment of a woodcut is damaged and text is partly
                    lost.
BodArchGe35.Editions:
Schreiber,  Wilhelm Ludwig.

         8 vols. Leipzig: Hiersemann, 1926: 866b, D.3, 9, 10.
Dodgson,  Campbell. 
             Woodcuts of the Fifteenth Century in the Ashmolean Museum,
                Oxford.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1929: 33.
Dodgson,  Campbell. 
             English Woodcuts of the Fifteenth Century
         Strasbourg: Heitz, 1936; repr. Naarden, Netherlands: Bekhoven,
            1970: no. 3.
